about_the_game:
Explore the variety of biomes, enemies and items. Build your defense and economy to save life itself from the great threat in Tower Field!

EXPLORE THE WORLD

Opening the map cell by cell, you will meet enemies who will build a path to your base, as well as items that will help you stop them. The further you go, the more dangerous foes you encounter, so make sure you can stand up to them!

MAKE UNIQUE TOWERS

To resist the always changing threats, you will need an adaptable defenses. Put items in towers and combine them in any ways you want. Use the resources you got wisely. Precise crafted tower build can take care of wide field of tasks that will be thrown at you!

BUILD UP THE ECONOMY

Every base you got gives you gold every wave. To have enough resources in not only about spending them wisely, but increasing your incomes. Use flagpoles to reach for enemy caves and conquer them to place your new base instead!

BECOME STRONGER

Collect Diamonds by defeating bosses and looting chests. Spend them to buy permament improvements for your next runs. Upgrade various aspects of the game, depending of your strategy and playstyle and make more progress with each diamond you got!

SAVE THE LIFE

Reach the farthest fields to confront the most dangerous threats that encroach on the life itself. Defeat the bosses one by one to save the world from the power which it has created.

short_description: Tower Field is a roguelike tower defense game with a random generated world to explore and modular towers that you can customize and adapt to protect yourself from the dangers you discover.
